import { LinkCard, Tabs, TabItem } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

<LinkCard
  title="Demo"
  href="https://brutal-demo.astro-ghostcms.xyz/"
  description="Live Demo of BrutalbyElian Theme"
/>

### To Quickly get started with this theme just run the following command
<Tabs>
  <TabItem label="npm">
    ```sh title="Simple"
    # Run this command and follow the prompt!
    npx @matthiesenxyz/create-astro-ghostcms brutal 
    # Want to pass arguments through to the command?  YOU CAN!
    #  `--install`     : Sets Install Dependencies to 'true'
    #  `--git`         : Initiates git Repo
    #  `--pkg-manager` : Specify your Package manager(i.e. npm, yarn | DEFAULT: pnpm)
    ```
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="pnpm">
    ```sh title="Simple"
    # Run this command and follow the prompt!
    pnpm dlx @matthiesenxyz/create-astro-ghostcms brutal 
    # Want to pass arguments through to the command?  YOU CAN!
    #  `--install`     : Sets Install Dependencies to 'true'
    #  `--git`         : Initiates git Repo
    #  `--pkg-manager` : Specify your Package manager(i.e. npm, yarn | DEFAULT: pnpm)
    ```
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="yarn">
    ```sh title="Simple"
    # Run this command and follow the prompt!
    yarn dlx @matthiesenxyz/create-astro-ghostcms brutal 
    # Want to pass arguments through to the command?  YOU CAN!
    #  `--install`     : Sets Install Dependencies to 'true'
    #  `--git`         : Initiates git Repo
    #  `--pkg-manager` : Specify your Package manager(i.e. npm, yarn | DEFAULT: pnpm)
    ```
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
